name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Advanced Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **.NET**, **C#**, **SQL**, **Microsoft SQL Server**, **Azure**, along with strong skills in **JavaScript** and **ASP.NET**. Experienced in CI/CD practices utilizing **GitHub**, **Jenkins**, and **Git**, driving quality assurance through unit testing and process improvements. Expertise in **Cloud Native Patterns** aligns with modern software engineering principles to deliver innovative solutions.

Proficient in building and deploying applications leveraging modern frameworks and technologies, such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Hands-on experience in developing AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing. Committed to compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Adept problem solver with a proven ability to innovate and troubleshoot complex issues in engineering design.
